mapper.update: UPDATE wms_material_transaction SET type = #{type}, source = #{source}, status = #{status}, rf_id = #{rfid}, inbound_id = #{inboundId}, stock_location_id = #{storageLocationId} WHERE id IN ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM wms_material_transaction WHERE material_code = #{materialCode} and del_flag IS NULL and inbound_id IS NULL and outbound_id IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{quantity}) AS subquery)

UPDATE wms_material_transaction SET type = #{type}, source = #{source}, status = #{status}, inbound_id = #{inboundId}, stock_location_id = #{storageLocationId} WHERE id IN ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM wms_material_transaction WHERE rf_id = #{rfid} and del_flag IS NULL and inbound_id IS NULL and outbound_id IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{quantity}) AS subquery)

UPDATE wms_material_transaction
type = #{type}, source = #{source}, status = #{status}, note = #{note},
WHERE inbound_id = #{id} and del_flag IS NULL

UPDATE wms_material_transaction
type = #{type}, source = #{source}, status = #{status}, note = #{note},
WHERE outbound_id = #{id} and del_flag IS NULL
UPDATE wms_material_transaction set del_flag = true WHERE rf_id = #{refId} and del_flag IS NULL
UPDATE wms_material_transaction set outbound_id = NULL WHERE outbound_id = #{id} and del_flag IS NULL
UPDATE wms_material_transaction set del_flag = true WHERE inbound_id = #{id} and del_flag IS NULL
mapper.insert:
insert into wms_material_transaction
id, material_code, type, source, inbound_id, outbound_id, stocktaking_id, warehouse_id, stock_location_id, rf_id, operator, status, note, del_flag, create_time, update_time, materials,
values
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{material_code,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inbound_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{outbound_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stocktaking_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{warehouse_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{stock_location_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rf_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del_flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{Materials},
mapper.update: UPDATE wms_material_transaction SET stocktaking_id = #{stocktakingId} WHERE id IN ( SELECT id FROM ( SELECT id FROM wms_material_transaction WHERE material_code = #{materialCode} and stock_location_id = #{storageLocationId} and del_flag IS NULL and stocktaking_id IS NULL and inbound_id IS NOT NULL and outbound_id IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{quantity}) AS subquery)
UPDATE wms_material_transaction SET stocktaking_id = NULL WHERE stocktaking_id = #{stocktakingId} and del_flag IS NULL
